channel.title: CVE Feed for Moxa -- MGate MB3180 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moxa -- MGate MB3180 Series

item.title: CVE-2021-4161|2024-09-16T19:24:13.483Z -- moxa -- mgate%20mb3180%20series
item.description: The affected products contain vulnerable firmware, which could allow an attacker to sniff the traffic and decrypt login credential details. This could give an attacker admin rights through the HTTP web server.
